biotools.summary: AutoFAIR is portal for automating FAIR assessments for bioinformatics resources. AutoFAIR a semi-automated tool to assess a resource according to the Findability, Accessibility, Interoperability and Reusability (FAIR) criteria. The aim is to create a portal that presents the assessment score together with a report that researchers can use to gauge a resource.
